data.title: Bucknell University
data.meta_description: Brendan Coyle (15) Faceoff - One-time Patriot League Faceoff Specialist of the Week. 2023 (Junior): Played in all 13 games, serving as the team’s primary fac...
data.text:
One-time Patriot League Faceoff Specialist of the Week.

2023 (Junior): Played in all 13 games, serving as the team’s primary faceoff specialist … was 87 of 217 on faceoffs (.401) … added 29 ground balls, three goals and four caused turnovers … earned Patriot League Faceoff Specialist of the Week honors after winning 14 of 22 (.636), scoring two goals and collecting a season-high seven ground balls against No. 12/11 Loyola (3/18) … won at least 50 percent of faceoffs in three games … was 18 of 31 (.581) on faceoffs and scored a goal along with six ground balls in a win at Holy Cross (4/15) … member of the Patriot League Academic Honor Roll.

2022 (Sophomore): Played in eight games, going 4-for-17 in the faceoff x ... went 2-for-2 with two ground balls against Lafayette ... posted an assist and a ground ball against Holy Cross.

2021 (Freshman): Did not compete.

Before Bucknell: Lettered three times in lacrosse and once in indoor track & field at Jamesville-DeWitt High School … in lacrosse, made the 2019 All-SCAC First Team and the 2018 All-SCAC Second Team … member of two NYSPHSAA Section 3 title-winning teams (2019 & 2017) … helped team reach the 2019 and 2017 NYSPHSAA Class C state championship game … member of three SCAC Empire title-winning teams (2019, 2018 & 2017) … helped team finish the 2019 season with a 21-2 record and a No. 2 ranking in the final NYS Class C rankings … helped the track & field team win the 2019 NYSPHSAA Section 3 indoor championship.

Personal: Brendan Xavier Coyle … born December 5, 2001 in Port Jefferson, New York … son of Patrick and Jennifer Coyle … has two siblings: Liam and Fallon … father played rugby at SUNY Cortland … Liam is a member of the Maryville University lacrosse team's class of 2023 … has two uncles and a cousin who played collegiate lacrosse … major is mechanical engineering.
